GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /artwork.description: serves an array of 20 different artworks, 10 from each API

GET /artwork/:id.description: serves information of artwork at the given id

GET /api/users.description: serves mockUsers object containing user's names, collections and IDs

GET /api/users/:userId/:collections.description: serves all collections available for an individual user

GET /api/users/:userId/:collections/:col.description: serves an individual colelction available on the user and its contents, which are either artwork IDs or a message stating there are no artworks in the collection
